website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality microwavable wrap delivers supreme comfort and is easy to use. It can also be used for cold therapy.
pros: Around-the-neck design delivers instant relief to those suffering from neck and back pain or migraines
Comfortable weight allows users to wear this for extended time
Comes nicely packaged and is made of durable and soft fabric
cons: Wrap does not have a closure, so it may slip out of place from time to time

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but scent is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this wrap except the smell / scent. The scent makes us both very sick. I actually thought I might vomit after using it a few times one evening. I kept using it because it felt so amazing on my neck and shoulders, but then I thought I had a stomach flu. I tried it again the next day because it felt awesome and I thought it was a fluke...Unfortunately, I started to get nauseous again. I returned it, but I am still sad because everything I’ve tried since doesn’t compare. I wish they made this in an unscented version like they do with other neck wraps. What do you think?
customer_reviews.author: Researcher

customer_reviews.title: Great neck/shoulder wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Soft fabric, smells good and covers a large area around the neck & shoulders. My husband decided to try it out and he really liked it also. I ordered another one for my mom because she loved it too. Update: We have been using this in the microwave to heat and we have not had any problems. As you can see from the photo it looks as good as new and we have used it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd heard of it sooner...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it! I got this today. I had a very tense day, car broke down, went to the doctor, and so on...this was delivered today. I had a migraine, and very tense shoulders along with neck pain. I heated the wrap in the microwave for 2 minutes and put it on...instant relief!!! I do wish it stayed warm a little longer, but you can re-microwave it when it cools off. The wrap smells amazing! I drifted off to sleep the second time I warmed it up. I love this product, thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Zenobia

customer_reviews.title: So sorry.
customer_reviews.text: Love this a lot, but first one leaked the inners. The fabric/stitching does not hold up against the weight of the inside. The company immediately sent me a replacement, but that one did the same thing. So dissatisfying, as this was very helpful with neck pain. Possibly, the company should change to a sturdier fabric with no stretch and a sturdier stitching. I think that would resolve the issue. I miss using it. The company was very responsive to replace the first one ordered. I wish I could give better feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Law

customer_reviews.title: Oh.My.Goodness. This is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Our entire family loves the Huggaroo Neck Wrap!! My son went to sleep tonight wearing it and he is eight years old. As a family we have decided that we need at least two of the neck wraps in our household. The material is soft and comfy. What I personally like the most is the high back neck feature. I felt the tension leaving not only my neck but my shoulders as I sat and watched T.V. while wearing it. In addition to the heat relaxation, I enjoyed the herbal fragrance as well. It is subtle and not overpowering in the least which I liked. I believe I have found the perfect Christmas gift for families and friends!
customer_reviews.author: J. Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Tension relief!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Was looking for something that covered both neck and shoulders, which is where I carry my stress. This has a nice gentle weight, but is easy to wear around the house hands free. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and helps my family members with Rheumatoid arthritis. It is large enough to wrap around several different places in the body, heats wells, helps relax muscles, etc. However, it's not too big or heavy or cumbersome. It was a great purchase! I might need two!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonZing

customer_reviews.title: It is super soft and the weight is distributed in just the ...
customer_reviews.text: I woke up with a pounding headache, took medicine and put on the neck wrap. It is super soft and the weight is distributed in just the right places to help alleviate stress and provide a feeling of calm. Such a simple product with HUGE benefits. Thanks! Yikes! My 17 year-old daughter took my Huggaroo neck wrap to reduce neck tension while studying...and that was four months ago! Time to order a second neck wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this high quality neck wrap to soothe your stress ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product! This neck wrap arrived promptly and is really well made. The material is very soft and comforting. The subtle fragrance is delightful and relaxing. I would recommend this high quality neck wrap to soothe your stress away!
customer_reviews.author: James R. Michels

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this Huggaroo neck wrap!! It's Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't tried this neck wrap, you are missing out! Perfect for relaxing after a hard day at work. I carry a lot of stress in my upper back and neck area, but after a hot shower and my Huggaroo wrap, i feel relaxed and can now sleep better. My husband even asks to borrow it all the time! I would recommend this to anyone for relaxing, sore muscles, anxiety.... it's perfect!! Now my son asks for it every night before bed to relax! Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: MENDY

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and the fits well!
customer_reviews.text: I hurt my shoulder and purchased this to help soothe the pain. It smells AMAZING and does the trick. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A SaramaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great neck wrap!
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is amazing! The fabric is incredibly soft and once heated has a very nice spa-like scent. I've purchased similar items before that were just big floppy squares with no structure (and horrible overpowering lavender fragrance) so I was constantly struggling to keep the heat and weight where I wanted it. This drapes so nicely and provides a nice relaxing weight on tired muscles. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wrap!
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is wonderful....lays nice around your neck and shoulders. The seller did a great job getting this wrap to me in a timely matter. I would highly recommend this wrap!
customer_reviews.author: S. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Tore open after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Heating pad tore open after using it 10 times in the past 6 weeks. Works well for a limited amount of time. Definitely not worth the purchase with structural integrity as poor as this.
customer_reviews.author: nav

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit when I first read the reviews they sounded phony and fake. Now that I've actually tried the Huggaroo I now know how amazing it truly is. Not only is it aromatic and therapeutic it'll keep you warm I don't want to take it off. I am considering getting a second one for work and then I can have one at home also. I would highly recommend this to anyone with any back pains or neck pains it's cheaper than a visit to the chiropractor.
customer_reviews.author: T Will

customer_reviews.title: This wrap is A++++++ in my book!
customer_reviews.text: This Huggaroo Neck Wap is totally awesome! I could just kick myself for not ordering it sooner! I’ve been suffering with stabbing pain up the left side of the neck into the back of my head for way too long.Trips to muscle therapist, accupuncture, & chiropractic treatments helped some but this heat wrap gave me the finishing touches for total refief! It stays nice and warm/hot and I have the freedom to move around instead of being confined to my heating wrap that I have to plug in! It’s nice and soft and hugs my neck while also heating my upper back muscles!
customer_reviews.author: M. Arkebauer

customer_reviews.title: It smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give the scent 0 stars. I bought this thinking I could use it for hot and cold compress. It only works with heat. The smell is awful. I’m a massage therapist who works around essential oils everyday; I use essential oils in my house and the smell of this thing makes me want to vomit. If you are someone who has tension headaches or migraines that stem from your neck and shoulders (like me) don’t buy this. The scent will only make the migraine or headache worse.
customer_reviews.author: QC

customer_reviews.title: Herb filling pokes out of fabric and pokes your skin.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, soft fabric, fast delivery, but the “herb” filling pokes out of the fabric poking you in the neck and back.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Expert Squared

customer_reviews.title: smells wonderful. 2 minutes in the microwave and perfect temperature
customer_reviews.text: Soft, smells wonderful. 2 minutes in the microwave and perfect temperature. Great for helping the neck and shoulder muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Barker

customer_reviews.title: Love the Huggaroo Neck Wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this Huggaroo Neck Wrap. Just received it today, microwaved it for 2 minutes and have been enjoying the wrap around my neck and shoulders. The weight is perfect, soothing and very comforting. The smell is amazing! It's been a stressful day and this experience is about to make me drift off to sleep. Think I'll have to now try the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad scent
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great heating pad for any soreness in your neck, shoulders, or upper back. It heats quickly and stays at the right temperature for a good amount of time. The only reason I’m not giving 5 stars is the scent, it’s tolerable but after a while can honestly be nauseating. I wish hugaroo would make this in an unscented version. If you’re not too bothered by it, then this is a great product, but if you are extra sensitive to scents, this is not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Keeps good heat.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have not only neck issues but shoulder issues as well. After heating this, it really covers everthing, and stays warm for almost 45 min. My only thing I don't like is that the beads are all at the bottom of each section and can't stay spread throughout the section. Maybe if the sections were sewn thinner, then the beads would stay in the whole section and not pile up down at the bottom. That's why it only got 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: C Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Performed beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: First time I used this, I was impressed. It did so much better than the rice "snake" I had been using. I liked the subtle herbal smell, very nice. It lasted a good time and, unlike the rice snake, the stuff inside stayed in place. The best part was that it covered my shoulders, neck and upper back. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Doug in SC

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: this just caught fire in my microwave so I'm not pleased with it....
customer_reviews.author: minnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I have made my own rice bags for years but nothing quite this size -- filling with rice would weigh a ton and be difficult to wear. This one smells wonderful -- the scent Is very relaxing -- it fits my neck perfectly and is not too heavy. I just ordered another one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gambalie

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: My kids are already trying to make this their own. The material is incredibly soft, it fits well around my neck and shoulders, and the weight of it is very calming to me. I have pains in my upper neck and this reaches my trouble spot very well. This may be a Christmas gift to others this year.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D Herzog

customer_reviews.title: My 96-year-old Mother LOVES This!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the Huggaroo today, tore open the box immediately and microwaved it for three minutes before taking it into my 96-year-old Mother who has extremely painful Osteoarthritis...her neck being one of her worst spots...she immediately sank into it in bliss...I checked on her a minute later and she opened her eyes and asked me where I found it. Then she smiled and said, "This is great! I am in heaven!" There is no better review I can give any product!!! 20 Stars and my highest recommendation!!!
customer_reviews.author: summersky51

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I can see why a lot of people like this as it was great the first time I used it however, after one use it developed a whole in the back (small - but large enough for the insides to come out). This rendered it useless. Because of this i'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: $Mose

customer_reviews.title: Lousy quality - tear in fabric resulting in stuffing coming out. Does not hold heat.
customer_reviews.text: I looked forward to receiving this product as I have been suffering from results of spinal surgery.. What a disappointment!! Very poor quality - one existing tear and numerous threads indicating more in near future. I followed heating directions and found I only got about 10 minutes of relief. The product is being returned as I continue my search for drug-free pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful neck wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful neck wrap. When it's heated (in microwave), it becomes slightly moist to give the right amount of moist heat to the area and has a very mild aromatherapy scent. It's extremely soft and cozy and stays in place---and very generous size, so it will work for a man or woman. I would definitely recommend it. Also great for someone who is always cold or an elderly person.
customer_reviews.author: Songstress

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and love the lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times following the instructions and have had no issues with overheating or any damage to the wrap. The fabric is lovely, very soft and comfortable. It seems to heat evenly and holds the heat for at least 15-20 minutes. A quick 30 seconds in the microwave will reheat the pack and give you extra heat time. It does have a lavender scent which is wonderful if you like that aroma. If lavender is not something you enjoy then I would not recommend as the pack has a lasting lavender fragrance. This is a plus for me. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Product was so disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this purchase. When it arrived I used it. I was so put off by the awful smell and how clumsy the huggaroo was on my shoulders. I was ill at the time so I had no energy or stamina to return it. I am a senior/older so the loss of my money was sad and depressing. I have no idea what the stinky smell was but I have noticed the same comment mentioned in reviews. No I don't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Diane LaFata

customer_reviews.title: Migraine , neck & shoulder relief
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I keep it in the freezer, and use it until it is room temp (which takes a little while) alternating w/ heat. This fits around my shoulders and loosely at the nape of my neck . Great for pain relief and migraines. This hugaroo is a great concept for easing neck, back and shoulder pain. I never thought I would be able to ease migraine headaches enough to cut down on medication, but using this has had some help. Thru this method I can sometimes control the pain. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vantall2004

customer_reviews.title: Love the soft feel and comforting heat of this neck wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I Love my neck wrap! The only things I would change would be to make it longer around the back and shoulders. Also, I think the neck portion would be more effective if it were heavier/thicker. I love the soft fleece material and the smell is not overpowering. I use it frequently for neck/shoulder tension and headaches. I heat it carefully on a plate for 2 minutes and 30 seconds to 3 minutes and it retains the heat for about 1/2 hour. Follow the directions or it will burn.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Wish I had it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I always have tense muscles, but my neck and between shoulders have always been the worst. I wish I'd purchased this years ago! Exactly what I needed. It goes all the way up the back of my neck. Heat stays for about 20 mns. You can spread the seeds/pellets to your comfort level (I usually spread them evenly out to prevent burning, but heavier at the two ends so that the weight keeps it on evenly when I move around.) Perfect, perfect, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok; returned.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Herbal scent is very nice. Cover is comfy and soft. Blue color is pretty, though not an important factor for me. Good amount of moisture when heated. Cons: Returned, because the wrap just did not get warm enough for me, and the minimal warmth dissipated very quickly, lasting barely 10 minutes. I increased heating time incrementally, and also tried flipping it halfway through heating. The wrap seemed to be under-filled, in my opinion. I also did not like that I had to heat it on a plate. I might have kept the wrap if it had cost $19.99, but at $32.99, I expect better performance.
customer_reviews.author: NE WIS

customer_reviews.title: ... have neck and shoulder pain and this product is great for easing the pain
customer_reviews.text: I constantly have neck and shoulder pain and this product is great for easing the pain! It smells good but is not over powering. It stays hot for a long time too. It's comfortable and stays on well (which allows me to walk around the house and do things). I would definitely recommend this product. I imagine it would be awesome for cramps as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much. It was one of the best purchases I have made. It is exactly as they advertise—very soft, perfectly weighted, perfectly constructed to fit around shoulders and neck, you can do things while wearing it, and it smells delightfully relaxing and soothing. The ONLY thing I wish were different was that it held the heat longer—but I’m not rating it lower because of this, as I think this is just how all these types of products are (I’ve used rice bags, beans, etc., and none of them hold the heat for long periods of time). Over all, very satisfied, and use it all the time for chronic neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Love my Huggaroo
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!!! My neck aches and headaches are horrible. I currently have a membership at my local massage location, I have been prescribed medication for my headaches, and have tried everything recommended for relief. My massage therapist recommended heat to relieve my headaches, and my husband found the Huggaroo on Amazon. The first night I used it, I awoke a new person!!! I currently fall asleep with it every other night. I told it my co-residents about it, and they bought them as well! Due to sitting at a microscope all day, the Huggaroo relieves everyday muscle aches! Thank you Huggaroo!!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 6'2" tall husband who is having issues with his cervical spine.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was diagnosed with congenital spinal stenosis of his lumbar spine a few years ago and in the last month we have come to find out that he also has it in his cervical spine, which is causing multiple issues. After the appointment I did some research on ways to relieve his pain/symptoms one of which was heat/cold pads. I found your product on Amazon and felt it was going to do the trick. I wasn't wrong - nightly after work he comes home and spends sometime under the wrap and feels so much better that he is able to get a good night sleep. I would recommend this neck wrap to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I use my huggaroo everyday. I even bought an additional one for my mom. It does not hold heat longer than 30 minutes but that's expected. You can feel the moist heat well. I have had microwavable products in the past that have burned in the microwave but even with using this multiple times a day I haven't had any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband to relieve neck and shoulder pain. The size and weight are perfect and brought him immediate relief. Aroma is very slight and not at all offensive. The only negative is that it does not hold its heat for more than 10 minutes. My husband is disabled, so I have to jump up and "re-nuc" it every 10 to 15 minutes...a pain. Wish it held the heat like another pad I have that's filled with dried beans/lentils etc. If you don't need it for more than a few minutes, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Teri L. Swanner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: What I really love about this wrap is the extra part around the neck. I've tried others that just go around the shoulders. This wrap actually helps my neck too. I also love that the smell is not too strong. I have a sensitive nose so this one is perfect. It heats up nice and last long enough for me to be done. It's not too heavy and the beads are evenly distributed. I love it and I can't wait to try it cold.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Reed

customer_reviews.title: Comforting
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The perfect weight, and the aroma therapy aspect is a plus. There are specific directions included on how to use and keep like new. My specific pain is located on my pectoralis major, so I wish the front over the shoulder part extended down a little further, but I just wear it lopsided and it does the trick. It's really good for tight neck muscles too.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Spang

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. It provides a ton of relief when I have a sore neck or headache. It reaches my entire neck, shoulders and upper back. I love the soothing scent which also helps relax me. It is a little heavy but that is because it is covering such a large area. I don’t mind at all. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing for stress headaches that occur in back of neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.text: Love this neck wrap for my middle of the night migraines or end of day stress headaches. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Mays

customer_reviews.title: A bit short
customer_reviews.text: This is a relaxing thing to use for warmth. It should really be longer where it rests on your shoulders, though, and also higher in the back to your neck. I only weigh 100 lbs. and if I don't sit perfectly still, it feels like it's going to fall off my shoulders. It smells wonderful. Would be nice if it stayed warm longer but it seems completely in line with any other I've ever tried. Not sure yet if I'm going to keep it. For the money, I was slightly disappointed but in a pinch, it would do the job.
customer_reviews.author: MoonlitSky

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver for neck & shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this two days ago as I was experiencing agonizing neck and shoulder pain, and oh my god, it's truly a lifesaver. I've taken ibuprofen, used all sorts of compresses, but this is my absolute favorite and it really works. It's so easy to microwave, stays on just like a shawl, and the aroma therapy is incredibly calming. I've already used it both on my shoulder/neck area and on my head for a migraine. It's helped both. I already told my dad to order one.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Really helps!
customer_reviews.text: The Hugaroo is really helpful. I have neck, shoulder and upper back pain from a fall and from stress. This wrap puts warm hugs around my neck and shoulders, and helps relieve the pain. I liked it so much that I have one at home and one at my office. I'd prefer unscented, but the light scent is not triggering my many scent allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for me my son and my husband multiple times in the first week of purchase. My son got a crook in his neck and i grabbed it and warmed it for him. I used it to relax on the sofa and was asleep in less than 5 minutes. The smell is there but not overwhelming. I didnt realize it was a moist heat (even though it is in the product name) but that is also a nice feature. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JChambers

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Heat Wrap in All the right places
customer_reviews.text: After having cervical spine surgery, I started using this around the neck, shoulders and upper back. It was great and relieved most of the pain. The only design change I suggest is to add velcro on the front to keep it from falling off when moving my head/neck back. It would stay secured while walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: The Huggaroo neck wrap is very soothing: when heated ...
customer_reviews.text: The Huggaroo neck wrap is very soothing: when heated in the microwave, it is pleasantly warm and fragrant, and the fabric is soft and comforting. The wrap is also well constructed and aesthetically pleasing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The heat is somehow moist every use. It is nice and heavy and feels like a big hug. I enjoy the smell. It is not too overpowering, but you can put your nose against it and smell it. Sometimes I just lay it on top of my body while I fall asleep- it almost works like a tiny weighted blanket. It's very comforting and I use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: Love these neck wraps!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these as gifts and was so pleased with the look and feel of these when they arrived. My daughter loved hers so much, she immediately ordered one for a friend. After using my husband's I realize I can't live without my own and will be ordering one for myself. I found that when I heated per the instructions, mine stayed warm for 20 minutes, which was more than I expected. Very comfortable and soothing with very little effort. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Donna O'Keeffe

customer_reviews.title: Huggaroo Works
customer_reviews.text: We use the product for neck and shoulder strain. Got my wife one... she liked it so much... convinced me to get one for myself... so I did. Definitely follow the instructions on the box... do NOT overheat them... make sure you check your microwave's power setting before setting the length of time. It's better to underheat ... and gradually increase the time needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jones

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Relieves my shoulder pain. Some reviewers have complained of an odor after heating. It does not smell unpleasant to me and I have very sensitive nose. I've also used similar products in the past for headache and sinus relief which did have a very strong odor, so I'm familiar with what the reviewers describe, but it is not my experience with this particular product. I recommend this product to ease shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: JenJup

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 2 months now, one of the best purchases I've made! It gets so nice and toasty and smells great! UPDATE: ive now had the huggaroo for 8 months. I recently went on vacation without it and got some bad neck and shoulder pain and couldn't wait to get back home to pop this bad boy in the microwave and relax away my pain! It still smells good, not as strong as when I first bought it but I'm sure that's true for anything. Overall i honestly dont even know how i got by before my huggaroo. If anything happened to it you bet I'd be buying a new one asap!
customer_reviews.author: H. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: ahhhh.....love this...
customer_reviews.text: What a great heating pad. It's so soft, I love the delicate lavendar smell, and it feels like a moist heat, which is suppose to be the best for relaxing muscles. The neck part fits perfectly and it's a nice large size that hugs the shoulder blades and really gets the heat there. I even use for my lower back and hips, lying on my side. Worth every penny. This company did a great job! And I've bought many a heat wrap, and this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This neck wrap is so comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: This neck wrap is so comfortable and warm. I have Rheumatoid arthritis and heated it up in the microwave for 20 minutes. It was so warm after and lasted for a half hour. So nice and toasty!
customer_reviews.author: DG&RG

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Neck spasms and shoulder pain was becoming increasingly debilitating- ordered the Huggaroo - took it out of the box that night and heated up. Mine took 2 minutes to heat on my microwave- hot but not harmfully so - WONDERFUL. Released and spasms stopped. Is my neck still stiff - yes - do my shoulders still bother me the next day - yes. This is not a cure all - but a relief from spasms and pain. PLUS - it actually fits and hugs the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Taintor

customer_reviews.title: This by far is the best microwave wrap on the market
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best microwave wrap on the market! I have used others but, most do not come up on your neck like this one does. It also holds the heat much longer, than the rice or barley wraps. Another plus, is there is no smell! Money well spent on this wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Bought my FOURTH Huggaroo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself... then one for my son... then one for a good friend... then one for my wife. TWO of these were for pain relief, and the other two were more for comfort!! My friend has no neck pain but reports that he puts it on and immediately goes to sleep! Christmas is coming.. I will probably order more!!
customer_reviews.author: robert t goad

customer_reviews.title: Neck Pain Improved
customer_reviews.text: Our internist recommended a neck wrap for my husband who was experiencing neck pain. His wife had excellent results with one. Since receiving and using the wrap, my husband's neck pain has eased and he is extremely satisfied with the results. He wanted one that not only covered the neck but also the back of his head, which this does. He sits back in his recliner and enjoys the magic.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. Vasilj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for neck and shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I've ever found on amazon. Had neck and shoulder issues from using computers too much. Tried various neck and solution and finally found this one. Shared with everyone in my office and they all loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for over a year and I love it so much. It holds the heat for quite a while and has been great for my fibromyalgia pain. I usually heat it for one minute and flip it over and heat for another minute or so. It’s a little heavy but feels great once on the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Feels delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Coming home from work with a stiff neck and aching shoulders, it feels so good to wrap myself in this warm, heavy wrap. It really helps relax me, and leaning back on it makes my neck feel better. And, if my room is cold, this helps to warm me up! Perhaps the only downside is, it says not to heat it when it's damp, which means you can't reheat it in the same night, because it stays damp for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis S.

customer_reviews.title: Confusion between product’s description and instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The description says moist heat & aromatherapy. The instructions say make sure the wrap is completely dry before heating it to prevent damage to the clay beads... Contradictory information, to be sure. I ordered the wrap for the moist heat I need for therapy. I also couldn’t detect any aromatherapy. I can’t rate it until I have clarification on features actually guaranteed for this wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: It Performs To Specifications and Brings Relief
customer_reviews.text: I needed a heating pad like this because of a current bout of tendinitis in my right shoulder and neck area. I am delighted to say that the Huggaroo fit the bill perfectly. It covers both shoulders and has a raised flap for the neck. It is easy to use and it provides to me the relief that I need. I would recommend this product for anyone with a problem like mine, or is simply looking for a heating pad for the neck and shoulder area.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Spence

customer_reviews.title: Great quality heating wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is the most perfect microwaveable heating wrap. In fact, I am ordering another one for my mother in law who has a heating wrap but hers did not provide the same wrap-around coverage as this one. She loved this one as I do! It has some weight to it but the heating “beads”are distributed evenly. I heat mine for 2 min.. and it will last a good 20-30 min.. Came boxed and was packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: This shawl-style neck warmer works very well for reducing muscle ...
customer_reviews.text: This shawl-style neck warmer works very well for reducing muscle tension in my neck and shoulders. It is super-soft and has a light lavender fragrance when heated. I put mine in a small cloth bag before putting it in the microwave in order to keep the neck wrap cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Patty K

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep heat, smells terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this, especially since it was so pricey!! It was bigger than expected and heavy. The material is very soft and if you wear if around your shoulders it does feel comforting like a hug almost! The casing isn't removable to clean. It does not smell good. And it doesn't keep heat for more than like 10 mins so you have to microwave it ALL the time. I've now used it for a few more weeks and just am more disappointed! It gets all squished around and doesn't stay consistent with heating.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Holds the heat well
customer_reviews.text: I had a really nice one that I overheated but had it for many years and got my money’s worth. I ordered this one and love how soft it is. The scent is nice but not too powerful and it holds heat well. I am totally happy with it and would reorder or buy as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy CG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. It stays warm a long time and it stays put. I wouldn’t wear it for activities like washing the dishes, but when lounging in front of the TV, it doesn’t budge. It’s great for people who get stiff necks.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Woman

customer_reviews.title: Like getting a hug from Grover or Cookie Monster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for neck and shoulder pain. It is incredibly soft and furry -- like getting a hug from Grover or Cookie Monster. I've experimented with the microwave times. It stays warm for a long time. I appreciate that it comes up high enough on my neck, and the weight keeps it in place on my shoulders. I use it while typing on the computer and it's great. Scent is mild.
customer_reviews.author: KateJ

customer_reviews.title: Warm, fragrant, comfortable, and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second wrap from the company, I gave my first one to my sister. It's a nice product and stays warm for quite a while. The moisture created by heating it up is minimal but helps the heat to penetrate deeply. Some customers have complained about the fragrance, but I enjoy it...so it's really a subjective reaction. Overall I'm happy to have it and use it as needed.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Tension be gone
customer_reviews.text: Love this item . Used a similar one at a spa recently and wanted to find one for home. This was perfect! The heat melts away shoulder tension as well as neck stiffness. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: whit4d

customer_reviews.title: Helps with arthritis pain
customer_reviews.text: - Portable - No wires to contend with, although it only stays warm for a short period before one has to put it back in the microwave. Good to use in a workplace environment, or when you’re not sitting for extended periods. - Smells good and is soft. - It is heavy I cannot use it all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Kuki

customer_reviews.title: What aroma?
customer_reviews.text: The wrap is heavy and covers neck and shoulders - all of that is great. But I'm hardly smelling any aroma. I have to really breathe in hard to get even a whiff of aroma (which traces out to be quite nice otherwise, and not like the something another reviewer 'couldn't stand'). But then this is just a hot wrap, no aromatherapy for me. And not worth the $36 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best heating pad I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is a delightful pad, even if you don't have pain! My husband loves it too. My only suggestion is that it be made a bit wider. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nukkles

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product well worth the money so softe and maintains warmth for very long time sure you can get something similar for cheaper but this product is so worth the extra money. I had issues with the product possibly my mistakes and I called Customer service and Kate Was super knowledgeable of the product and very helpful.. I can't recommend this product enough I get the feeling from this company that they really care about making sure the customers happy and if you take care of the product it will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft and relieves pain
customer_reviews.text: I was recently diagnosed with RA. I was looking for something to help relieve some of the pain. I have been heating this in the morning since I received it. It helps loosen my shoulder up and relieve some of the pain. I really like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product; take care not to get it dirty
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 of these and 1 was gifted to me. They are super soft and they hold up pretty well. If you take care of it, it won't get too dirty, but it is worth noting that you can't easily wash the outside of this product, so you have to be really careful not to get it dirty. Second, after a couple years, the scent wears off. However, that's to be expected. Over all, this is a really good product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel C. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the pad for heat and wow does it hold heat. I haven't put it in the fridge yet but if this thing holds heat, I'm sure it'll hold the cold just as efficiently. I am not a fan of the herbal aromatherapy but that's just me. Still get's the 5 stars for overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently was involved in a roll over vehicle accident and have been suffering with pain in my neck and shoulders ever since. The hugaroo is perfect for the amount of space it covers and the feature I like the most, is that not only does it drape over your shoulders, but the piece that comes up the back of the neck is awesome too. I’m more than happy with this product and I’ve been showing/telling everyone I know how great it is! Thank you huggaroo!
customer_reviews.author: stacy berardi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband has trouble with both shoulders, I bought it for him for Christmas, and he has used it almost every night since! He loves it, it heats up nicely and is heavy enough to stay in place, which is Awesome!! Would recommend, would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift, and she loved it. It is heavier than expected, which really helps with aches and pains. Easy to microwave, just do it in short increments to build up to the heat level you want. The heat lasts for quite a bit of time too. Very pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: January Gray

customer_reviews.title: Worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.text: My old wrap was nice, it was u-shaped, and I thought it was amazing. Then it got old and started to smell like burnt popcorn. I tried replacing it by shopping at the regular grocery store, and I also tried to be cheap. They were awful. They smelled like perfume (not the good kind) and didn't heat evenly. I needed quality, which is exactly what I got with this. It's soft, and plush, and the way it's sewn there is even heat. It smells phenomenal (natural herbs, with no harsh fake perfumes that I can detect). They best part is the way it hits alllllll the spots.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Rippy

customer_reviews.title: It’s great if....
customer_reviews.text: ...you enjoy weightlifting with your neck. Pain relief? It causes addtl pain by the weight it places on your neck! Softness? I can’t tell if the softness Of the matl I’m felling on my neck -or- the numbness I’m receiving after wearing it for 5mins. Smell? It smells sweaty after wearing it for 5mins because of the work you have to exert & the struggle you have.just getting it the heck off your body. A warning note should read...Requires 2 people to place and remove!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It feels fantastic when heated. Haven't tried cooling it for cold therapy yet, but I'm sure it will be just as great. Its very, very soft with a great soothing scent that is just enough. I'd like to have a blanket like this to stuff in the microwave. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm relief, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was having serious pain from being at the keyboard all day turning to look at 3 monitors. The Huggaroo covered the whole area that hurt, better than those stick on heaters. It's soft, and reusable I carry it from work and home so I am not without, I might buy one for each place. I told a friend and she LOVES it too. Get you a Huggaroo!
customer_reviews.author: christinedoom

customer_reviews.title: Heating pad
customer_reviews.text: Kinda silly looking but I love it and have used it multiple times daily. Takes about 3.5 min to heat up. Stays warm for ten min or so. Heavy. Nice smell. Feels really good and soothing on achy necks and shoulders, especially in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, fix the stitching
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept. It heats well in the microwave. Smells great. Very relaxing and easy to use. However, the stitching could definitely use some work. During the first use, I noticed a hole in a seam and some flax seeds fell out. I got it for my husband when we found out he has cancer. I can probably stitch it up and it will work well for a while. With everything we have going on, I wish that wasn’t something I have to do. I just wish it was more durable. Fix those stitching issues, and it would be an A+.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my great grandma as she has shoulder pains and she used ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my great grandma as she has shoulder pains and she used it for heat and has loved it! She recently got surgery & can only use it on cold for now but she still is always using it. Super soft & the herb is a light faint scent perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and shape! Smells like lavender for a little while!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent. I've had other pads with lavender in them, so I knew what to expect. I heat it on a plate for about a minute and a half, which seems to be just right. It's about twice the size of my last heating pad, so I really like that!
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Jump

customer_reviews.title: Get one and you wont regret it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a neck pain bothering me for a while which was also the cause of my migraines.....I wanted something that is easy to use and help with the pain. Found this beautiful solution on Amazon. It works very well and helped me with my neck pain. Its easy to use too. After a couple of times of putting it to use, my neck pain completely went away! I was able to work while it worked on my neck!!!! Don’t have to think twice about buying this product. The scent though is somewhat different and i wasn't a fan of that. However that didnt bother me much while using it.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth getting!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Stays warm for at least 10-15 minutes and you shouldn’t be leaving it on longer than that anyway. Very comfortable, hits all the muscles in my neck and shoulders, even the sides of my neck. Somehow the outside of certain sections cool off quickly but when I feel underneath it is still plenty warm so don’t worry about that if you notice it as well. Came sooner than promised, smells good (very subtle) and does everything it should exactly as it should. Even got a follow up email to be sure I was satisfied. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lesieur

customer_reviews.title: I love relaxing with the help of my
customer_reviews.text: I use my Huggaroo for my migraines and the pressure, temp, and scent are all very helpful in finding relief! I love relaxing with the help of my Huggaroo
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Grippo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible neck pain somedays, mainly due to my bad posture, but I remember using one of these as a kid in the shape of a dog which I absolutely loved! I couldn't find the dog one I had but this one had wonderful reviews and it definitely helped my neck! It smells amazing also! The only thing I did notice was that the herbs inside of it were sort of poking my shoulders sometimes when wearing a tank top but I just fixed the problem by wearing a T-shirt and it didn't seem to me that it deserved less than 5 stars because of that :)
customer_reviews.author: Leahndra Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great heat therapy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and we like it so much we use it for more than just neck pain. It holds heat well and can be laid across any part of the body regardless of the fact it’s shaped for the neck.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Huggaroo Neck Wrap Microwavable Heating Pad with Lavender, Blue
feature_bullets: Plush polyester fabric. Filled with flaxseeds, wheat, lavender, chamomile, peppermint, spearmint, lemon grass, rosemary, cinnamon, yarrow, white willow, valerian root, yellow dock, hops
Delivers 10 to 15 minutes of deep heat
Remains warm for another 10 to 15 minutes
May also be chilled in the freezer and used as a cold compress

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
